abstract: The SV40 T antigen database ( http://www.pitt.edu/~pipaslab/ ) lists viruses and plasmids expressing mutant forms of large T antigen. Each entry contains information regarding the mutant designation, mutant type, virus strain, nucleotide change, amino acid change and pertinent references. The database is now available as an internet searchable index.
about: Physical and Biochemical Characterisation of DNA
DNA-Mediated Cell Transformation and Nucleic Acids Transfer
title: SV40 large tumor antigen (T antigen): Database of mutants
